channel.title: Looking to start a server
channel.description:
I have no clue what section this went under so I just decided to put it here. I'm looking to start a project and I'm just wondering what should I use to start? I'm just looking to learn and just wondering which is the best to learn off. A clean source and client PI? Or what?
Thanks, Kingclawz

item.title: Looking to start a server
item.dc:creator: @Ole_Kristian Ole Kristian
item.description:
@Ole_Kristian wrote:

Hello! I have heard that RuneSource is a good base if you want to start a 317 RSPS.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking to start a server
item.dc:creator: @Death_Style Death Style
item.description:
@Death_Style wrote:

from what i’ve heard pi is a disaster but has a lot of snippets

if you were to do a bad source think of it as a learning experience that you will scrap one day rather than a genuine project

Read full topic
